Title: Establishes a public awareness campaign related to maternal depression; appropriation
Summary: Establishes a public awareness campaign related to maternal depression; establishes the maternal depression fund; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add Art 25 Title 7-A ยง2597, Pub Health L; add ยง97-n, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing a public awareness campaign for maternal depression; and making an appropriation therefor
